technical.focal_length: 85-135mm for portraits, 24-70mm for full body, 50mm for editorial work. Prime lenses preferred for sharpness
technical.depth_of_field: Variable - shallow f/1.4-f/2.8 for beauty shots, f/5.6-f/11 for full body to keep entire garment sharp
technical.shutter_speed: 1/125s-1/250s minimum for handheld, up to 1/1000s for movement, sync speeds for studio strobes
technical.lighting: Studio strobes with softboxes/beauty dishes, ring lights for beauty, natural window light, reflectors and diffusers essential
technical.camera_format: Medium format (Hasselblad, Fuji GFX) preferred for detail, full-frame DSLRs/mirrorless common

aesthetic.composition: Rule of thirds, leading lines, negative space emphasis, dynamic poses, attention to garment flow and drape
aesthetic.subject_background: Clean, minimal backgrounds in studio; environmental contexts that complement not compete; seamless papers common
aesthetic.tonal_range: High contrast for dramatic looks, softer contrast for beauty, emphasis on clean highlights and rich shadows
aesthetic.color_approach: Coordinated palettes, seasonal colors, brand-consistent schemes, often desaturated or complementary
aesthetic.texture_detail: Fabric texture crucial - sharp detail in garments, skin retouching for flawless finish, material properties emphasized

shooting_approach.subject_distance: Varies by shot type - close for beauty (3-6 feet), medium for three-quarter (8-12 feet), wide for full body (15+ feet)
shooting_approach.angle_perspective: Eye level common, slight high angle for slimming, low angle for power/drama, profile and three-quarter poses frequent
shooting_approach.subject_relationship: Primarily posed and directed, confident expressions, body language emphasizing garment fit and flow
shooting_approach.environment: Professional studios with cycloramas, high-end retail locations, urban settings, minimalist interiors

context.historical_context: Emerged in 1920s with Vogue and Harper's Bazaar, evolved through Avedon, Newton, Leibovitz innovations
context.key_characteristics: Emphasis on clothing/accessories, aspirational aesthetic, high production values, model as clothes horse
context.related_styles: Beauty photography, commercial portraiture, lifestyle photography, editorial photography

era_variants.notes: 1950s-60s: formal, studio-based; 1970s-80s: more dynamic, lifestyle integration; 1990s-2000s: grunge influence, candid feel; 2010s+: social media influence, authentic/diverse representation
